channel.title: Help
channel.description: Where can i change the starter clothes? Such as what new players start with.

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Search for this in player.java

//Giving the player an unique look

There you should see something like this :

		//Giving the player an unique look
		playerEquipment[playerHat]=XXXX;
		playerEquipment[playerCape]=XXXX;
		playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=XXXX;
		playerEquipment[playerChest]=XXXX;
		playerEquipment[playerShield]=XXXX;
		playerEquipment[playerLegs]=XXXX;
		playerEquipment[playerHands]=XXXX;
		playerEquipment[playerFeet]=XXXX;
		playerEquipment[playerRing]=XXXX;
		playerEquipment[playerArrows]=-XXXX;
		playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=XXXX;

Then just change the ‘xxxx’ to the item ID you want.

Read full topic
